attributes.additional_details: We have had remote learning for best part of 2 years now. We have no experience sitting examinations therefore the big step to A Levels will be difficult. The government have cancelled exams 2 years in a row now, the third shouldn’t be any different. These students have been affected in a different way and should be acknowledged.
attributes.background: Just like the 2020 and 2021 exams, the 2022 exams should also be cancelled.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
